about_the_game:
Expand Your Vampire Lair

Build and expand your castle by unlocking new rooms and floors. Each expansion offers new opportunities to enhance your vampires' abilities and unlock additional gameplay features.

Unleash Blood Magic

As a vampire, wield blood magic to fight humans and monsters. Draining blood from your foes fuels your vampiric agility - Chronostasis. This unique skill allows you to sow despair in the hearts of your enemies - using it causes your foes to freeze in place while you and your fellow vampires execute attacks with unimaginable speed.

Control Multiple Vampires

Hunting in Vampire Clans becomes even more strategic as you control up to three vampires at once, each with their own unique set of skills. Before heading into battle, you'll decide on the best tactics and specializations for your vampires. Players can switch between vampires at will, issuing commands to the others. The Chronostasis system makes managing multiple vampires more intuitive, allowing you to slow down the time and plan out your attacks with precision.

Stealth or Combat?

Not every battle needs to be fought head-on. The shadows are your greatest ally. Use stealth and your trained bats to stalk prey or eliminate enemies in a group, one by one. Skillfully avoiding detection allows you to take out opponents without engaging in direct combat.

Complex Clan Politics

The world of Vampire Clans is filled with political intrigue between rival vampire clans. These factions battle for power, raiding each other's outposts and clashing in the streets. The political system allows you to forge alliances or rivalries that will shape your journey.

Become the Plague of Paris

Step into an expansive, non-linear world that mirrors 19th-century Paris. Divided into sectors, the map guides your exploration while indicating the difficulty of enemies. As you venture deeper into the city, enemies become more challenging, requiring you to strengthen your character to survive. This open-world design allows for a rich RPG experience, where exploration is as rewarding as perilous.

short_description: Create the most powerful Vampire Clan, to take over Paris streets and underground. Challenge other clans, beat them and enslave. Use spells, alchemy and human blood to grow up your power. Become the terror of all inhabitants or use quiet politics to achieve your goals.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
